name: CyberFuck 2069
description:
Welcome to the Naughty City — a dangerous megalopolis filled with sex, lust, and willing naked girls.
Throw yourself into the middle of the action, and beware approaches from all angles!
Rogue-like shooter
Take on a pantheon of robotic enemies in an epic combat. Upgrade your character to be ready for any challenge using the strongest weapons you can find.
Adult Content
Deepen your connection with girls to unlock some hot sex scenes. Don't stop until the whole city is wrapped around your finger.
Take revenge, overcome your enemies and bring your fantasies to life in fully animated love scenes!
ALL CHARACTERS ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18
